answers.answer: It depends on the hospital but most will keep you after you are at a 4

Depends. If your water breaks it doesn't matter how far along you are. But if its from contractions every 5 minutes then its usually when you're a 4 but if you're a 3 they may keep you and have you walk around to see if you progress if not then they may send you home. But if you go in and aren't in labor and are a 4 they wont keep you.
At the hospital here , they kept me & I wasn't dialated much at all . Lol! But I guess me being in so much of pain with my labor & with me having preeclampsia they couldn't let me leave .

question: How far do you have to be dialated before they keep you at the hospital
title: Dialating!!!!!!!!!!
